screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Best Buy mobile website with search results for "soundlink mini ii" within the Bluetooth & Wireless Speakers category. The top listing is a sponsored product, a "Bose - SoundLink Flex Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Waterproof/Dustproof Design - Black," priced at $149.99, with the option to see open-box pricing from $134.99. Below the product's name and price, there are options to add the item to the cart, compare it with other products, or save it for later. The screen also includes navigation elements such as a menu button, search bar, and shopping cart icon.

Since the user wants the Bose SoundLink Mini specifically added to the cart, the next logical step is to add this item to the cart. It needs to be confirmed whether all other items have been cleared before proceeding to checkout.

Verify the cart to ensure there are no other items besides the Bose SoundLink Mini II.
If the cart contains only the Bose SoundLink Mini II, proceed to checkout by selecting the checkout option, usually found in the cart view.

action_result: By clicking on the "Add to Cart" button in the last screenshot, the Bose SoundLink Flex Portable Bluetooth Speaker has been added to the shopping cart on Best Buy's website, as indicated by the change in the shopping cart icon in the top right corner, which now shows a "1" indicating an item is present in the cart. Additional steps should include clearing the cart if any unwanted items are already there per user's request to clear all items from the cart prior to adding the SoundLink Mini.
